name: fireball-subgraphs
description: bundle of subgraphs for fireball.gg usage
author: dudendy <a.dude.koval@gmail.com>

scripts.subgraph:deploy:main:stage: cd subgraph/main && graph deploy --product hosted-service skv2rock/gotchi-main
scripts.subgraph:deploy:main:prod: cd subgraph/main && graph deploy --product hosted-service dudendy/kratoman
scripts.subgraph:deploy:verse:stage: cd subgraph && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ orden-gg/gotchiverse
scripts.subgraph:deploy:verse:prod: cd subgraph && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ orden-gg/gotchiverse
